tree_records_health_score_check.name: tree_records_health_score_check
tree_records_health_score_check.value: health_score IS NULL OR (health_score >= 0 AND health_score <= 100)

tree_records_vitality_score_check.name: tree_records_vitality_score_check
tree_records_vitality_score_check.value: vitality_score IS NULL OR (vitality_score >= 0 AND vitality_score <= 100)

tree_records_status_change_check.name: tree_records_status_change_check
tree_records_status_change_check.value:
(record_type = 'status_change' AND previous_status IS NOT NULL AND new_status IS NOT NULL) OR 
        (record_type != 'status_change')
